mapper.update: update user set email=#{email}, wechat=#{wechat} , userimgpath=#{userimgpath} where userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select doc.docid as docid,doc.title as title,recentread.readtime as readtime from doc,recentread where recentread.docid=doc.docid and recentread.userid=#{userid} order by readtime desc
select doc.docid as docid,doc.title as title where doc.docid=collection.docid and collection.userid=#{userid}
